Article Title: Mets star Francisco Alvarez becomes a dad for the first time and shares sweet photo with baby girl
Article Text:
Mets star Francisco Alvarez becomes a dad for the first time and shares sweet photo with baby girl (Image via Getty)

Francisco Alvarez and wife Nahomi become parents for first time

Francisco Alvarez shares his joy with fans online

Image via Instgram





A very special event happened this week in the life of New York Mets catcher Francisco Alvarez. Fans had noticed he wasn‚Äôt on the field during the Mets‚Äô recent games, and now, the reason has been revealed. While the team played on, Francisco and his wife Nahomi were waiting for a moment that would change their lives forever.On Tuesday, June 11, 2025, the New York Mets placed Francisco Alvarez on the paternity list. This meant he would miss a few games to be with his wife Nahomi as they prepared to welcome their first child. The Mets were about to begin a three-game series against the Washington Nationals at Nationals Park in Washington, D.C.That same day, Mets manager Carlos Mendoza told reporters that Alvarez was not available for the game because he was at the hospital with his wife. On Wednesday morning, June 12, Alvarez shared a special photo on his Instagram story. It showed him holding his newborn daughter close to his chest. The picture melted fans‚Äô hearts and quickly spread across social media.Nahomi Alvarez also gave a small peek into the moment.On her Instagram story, she posted a photo of her hospital bed, surrounded by food, with a soft caption. She later shared a short clip showing the tiny hands of their baby girl.This beautiful family moment came just after Francisco Alvarez played one of his best games of the season. On Sunday, June 9, against the Colorado Rockies at Citi Field in New York, Alvarez went 3-for-5. He hit a 450-foot home run and collected two RBIs, helping his team in a big win. It was a strong way to step away from the field and into fatherhood.Also Read: Young Mets fan snags Juan Soto‚Äôs home run in epic Citi Field moment Francisco Alvarez is just 22 years old but already has a strong fan following. His recent social media post, showing his daughter in his arms, was simple but full of love. Fans reacted with comments like ‚ÄúSo precious,‚Äù and ‚ÄúCongratulations, papa!‚Äù Many said they couldn‚Äôt wait to see him back on the field, now as a proud father.The Mets have not shared how many games Alvarez will miss. But it‚Äôs clear that the team, the fans, and most importantly, Francisco himself, are overjoyed by the new addition to the family.This heartwarming milestone marks the beginning of a new chapter for the young catcher. As Francisco and Nahomi embrace parenthood, fans celebrate alongside them, sending love and well wishes their way.
Article Summary: Mets star francisco alvarez becomes a dad for the first time and shares sweet photo with baby girl. On wednesday morning, june 12, alvarez shared a special photo on his instagram story. This beautiful family moment came just after francisco alvarez played one of his best games of the season.

Article Title: Taylor Swift‚Äôs fall Sundays are booked, ready to back Travis Kelce‚Äôs quest for another Super Bowl: "She‚Äôs not juggling a packed tour schedule"
Article Text:
Taylor Swift finally gets to be a full-time NFL girlfriend as Travis Kelce preps for new season (Getty Images)

No more tour, all touchdowns‚ÄîTaylor Swift to support Travis Kelce every step of the 2025 season







As the NFL gears up for the 2025 season, Taylor Swift is preparing for a quieter, more grounded fall ‚Äî and it‚Äôs all by choice. For the first time since her relationship with Travis Kelce began in 2023, the global superstar will head into football season without the weight of a world tour pulling her in opposite directions.‚ÄúTaylor is really looking forward to the upcoming NFL season. Not just because she loves supporting Travis, but because for the first full season since they started dating, she‚Äôs not juggling a packed tour schedule,‚Äù an insider shared exclusively with PEOPLE. The change marks a significant shift in their relationship dynamic, offering both Swift and Kelce the rare luxury of time.In the past two seasons, the couple managed to stay close despite crisscrossing continents and balancing high-pressure careers. ‚ÄúThe past two seasons were a whirlwind between performing across multiple countries, long flights, and trying to squeeze in alone time together wherever possible. It wasn‚Äôt easy but they made it work,‚Äù the source added. Their ability to maintain their connection through it all has become a testament to their commitment.Swift officially wrapped her record-breaking Eras Tour in December 2024 in Vancouver. Spanning five continents and grossing over $2 billion in ticket sales, the tour became the highest-grossing in history.But now, without rehearsals, flights, and nightly performances filling her calendar, the 14-time Grammy winner has space to breathe ‚Äî and cheer.With her schedule finally free, Swift is expected to be a more regular face in the Arrowhead Stadium stands. ‚ÄúHer schedule is much more open now that the Eras Tour is wrapped and she‚Äôs genuinely excited to have the time and flexibility to show up for Travis more consistently,‚Äù the source noted. ‚ÄúTaylor plans to be at as many of his games as possible.‚ÄùThat‚Äôs good news for Kansas City fans. While all eyes remain on Patrick Mahomes and his offensive arsenal ‚Äî including Rashee Rice, Xavier Worthy, Hollywood Brown, and, of course, Kelce ‚Äî the added energy from Swift‚Äôs presence brings its own kind of buzz to game day.After their public debut in September 2023, Swift‚Äôs regular appearances at Chiefs games, including the AFC Championship and Super Bowl LVIII, became headline moments. Now, without international flights cutting into her weekends, she and Kelce have a chance to settle into something more stable.‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a chance for them to settle into more of a routine and they‚Äôre both really happy about that,‚Äù the insider added.With football season approaching and fewer distractions in the way, Swift and Kelce are entering a new chapter ‚Äî one that could be defined less by chaos and more by companionship.Also Read: Hailee Steinfeld gives first clear look at massive engagement ring after secretive romance with Josh Allen
Article Summary: Taylor swift and travis kelce have been dating since 2023. Swift wrapped her record-breaking eras tour in december 2024 in vancouver. Now, without rehearsals, flights, and nightly performances, the 14-time grammy winner has space to breathe.

Article Title: Patrick and Brittany Mahomes on the same page about having a fourth child‚Äîand their answer might not be what fans hoped
Article Text:
Brittany Mahomes says no to baby no. 4 for now (Getty Images)

Are Patrick and Brittany Mahomes done having kids?



Brittany Mahomes: The Truth About Pregnancy, Staying Active, And Being An NFL Wife

Chiefs Andy Reid, Patrick Mahomes Trent McDuffie & Xavier Worthy Press Conference | JANUARY 14, 2025





Patrick Mahomes may have fallen just short of a historic Super Bowl three-peat at the end of the 2024 NFL season, but his life off the field has never looked brighter. As 2025 kicks into high gear, the Kansas City Chiefs quarterback is thriving in both his personal and professional life, celebrating the arrival of his third child and preparing for yet another demanding NFL season.The Mahomes family welcomed a new member on January 12‚Äîa baby girl named Golden Raye. She joins her siblings Sterling Sky, born in February 2021, and Patrick ‚ÄúBronze‚Äù Lavon, born in November 2022. With the addition of Golden, the Mahomes household has grown to five, and the couple seems perfectly content with that number.Brittany Mahomes, Patrick‚Äôs wife and longtime partner since their high school days, shared her thoughts on growing their family during a candid chat on the WHOOP Podcast. ‚ÄúNope. We're done, we're done for a while. Three,‚Äù she said with a smile. ‚ÄúI don't know, I mean I feel like you can never like say you're done, but I think three is all I need.‚ÄùPatrick echoed his wife‚Äôs words in a press conference shortly after Golden‚Äôs birth. ‚ÄúI'm good with three for right now,‚Äù he stated. ‚ÄúWe'll see down the line, maybe. But my goal was always three. So, we've had three. And we'll stick there for a while and see if we need to come back and get another one later on.‚ÄùThe couple, who began dating in 2012 and married in a stunning Hawaiian ceremony in 2022, have navigated life‚Äôs biggest transitions together‚Äîfrom college sweethearts to NFL fame, and now parenthood. Their bond remains strong as they juggle high-profile careers and family responsibilities.As a three-time Super Bowl champion, Mahomes isn‚Äôt taking his foot off the gas. He‚Äôs already back in action, attending OTAs with the Chiefs ahead of his ninth season. The team is gearing up for a global showcase, with their season opener set in Brazil against the Los Angeles Chargers‚Äîmarking an international milestone for both the franchise and the league.Away from the stadium lights, Mahomes also opened up about the support he receives from Brittany, especially in terms of inspiration. ‚ÄúI admire my wife Brittany's confidence,‚Äù he told People. ‚ÄúWhether it's in business, or supporting our family, she always leads with strength and purpose. That kind of confidence is powerful; it pushes me to be better every day.‚ÄùWith family fulfillment and football focus going hand-in-hand, Mahomes seems more driven than ever. Whether it‚Äôs leading the Chiefs into another title run or being a present father at home, his commitment to excellence remains unwavering.Also Read: Is Travis Kelce preparing for a graceful NFL exit? 5 veterans who might retire after the 2025 season
Article Summary: Patrick and brittany mahomes welcomed a baby girl on january 12. The couple has three other children: sterling sky, born in february 2021, and patrick "bronze" lavon, born november 2022. The chiefs quarterback says he's good with three for now.

Article Title: Jason Kelce shares his honest reaction after spotting a wild NSFW tattoo from a die-hard Eagles fan
Article Text:
Fan tattoos Jason Kelce naked on their leg (Getty Images)

Jason Kelce can‚Äôt believe Eagles fan got him tattooed nude







Jason Kelce has always had a unique relationship with Philadelphia Eagles fans ‚Äî built on mutual love, grit, and a healthy dose of humor. But even the future Hall of Famer was left scratching his head when a rather bold tribute started making rounds on social media.The buzz began when Crossing Broad shared a video featuring a passionate Eagles fan who got a tattoo of Jason Kelce ‚Äî completely nude, pin-up style. Tattoo artist Joe the Wizard created the unconventional ink, complete with an eagle drawn strategically over Kelce‚Äôs groin area. The tattoo, permanently inked on a forearm, quickly went viral for all the obvious reasons.Jason, known as much for his personality as his dominance on the field, took to X (formerly Twitter) after seeing the tattoo and delivered a classic Kelce reaction:"I'm not sure if I should be offended or flattered." He later replied to his own post, ultimately deciding, "I think it‚Äôs more flattered, it‚Äôs a generous bird, good sized head." That prompted a playful comment from fellow former NFL star Andrew Whitworth, who added,"I was going to say strong Beak!"Kelce‚Äôs reaction struck the perfect balance of humor and humility ‚Äî much like the man himself, who spent 13 seasons with the Eagles, earning six first-team All-Pro selections and anchoring one of the NFL's toughest offensive lines. Even in retirement, Kelce‚Äôs popularity hasn‚Äôt faded. If anything, his post-football charisma ‚Äî now amplified by his podcast and TV appearances ‚Äî is fueling even more fan devotion.However, no one was more surprised than his wife, Kylie Kelce. Commenting on the original TikTok video, she expressed a mix of amusement and disbelief: "Excuse me???" She followed that up with, "I don‚Äôt even know where to start."The tattoo drama comes right as Kylie prepares for Father‚Äôs Day festivities.On the June 12 episode of her Not Gonna Lie podcast, Kylie jokingly considered gifting Jason something outrageous to match his unique fashion sense."I'd probably buy him a banana hammock,‚Äù she laughed, referencing the infamous Borat outfit. Then she added with a smile,‚ÄúJust kidding. Four kids is enough.‚ÄùDespite the chaos, Kylie did confirm she‚Äôs made dinner plans at a restaurant both she and Jason love: ‚ÄúThe key is that Jason also loves it, so that's a win-win right there.‚ÄùFrom outrageous tattoos to heartfelt family dinners, the Kelce household continues to live at the intersection of hilarity, humility, and heart ‚Äî making them one of football‚Äôs most beloved families.Also Read: Taylor Swift‚Äôs fall Sundays are booked, ready to back Travis Kelce‚Äôs quest for another Super Bowl: "She‚Äôs not juggling a packed tour schedule"
Article Summary: A philadelphia eagles fan got a nude tattoo of jason kelce on their leg. Kelce was left scratching his head after seeing the tattoo on social media. His wife, kylie, joked that she'd like to buy him a banana hammock.

Article Title: Vanessa Bryant finally breaks silence on wild pregnancy rumors with a wild response featuring a Rihanna meme
Article Text:
Vanessa Bryant. Image via: Axelle/Bauer-Griffin/FilmMagic, Getty Images

Vanessa Bryant addressed her pregnancy rumors in a wild Instagram story



Vanessa Bryant's instagram response. Image via: vanessabryant/ Instagram

Poll Do you think Vanessa Bryant handled the pregnancy rumors well? Yes, very cleverly No, she should have addressed them directly

Met Gala Surprise: Rihanna Stuns With Baby Bump Reveal, A$AP Rocky Confirms It‚Äôs Baby No 3





After days of unrelenting speculation, Vanessa Bryant took to Instagram Stories on Sunday, June 1, to put the rumors to rest. Her response wasn‚Äôt a press statement or a legal warning, it was a wild meme with a big middle finger to the internet trolls. The meme featured music icon Rihanna floating in water with a snorkel mask on her head, holding a drink, and flipping her middle finger.‚ÄúMe protecting my peace, not pregnant & having fun all summer,‚Äù Vanessa Bryant wrote in the caption on her response to the online trolls who spread her pregnancy rumors about five years after her husband, Kobe Bryant ‚Äôs, untimely and devastating demise.It was clear, clever, and vintage Vanessa who shut down noise without saying a word about the origin of the gossip. No press release needed when you‚Äôve got Rihanna energy with a direct middle finger gesture.The rumors had emerged out of nowhere, with some users pointing to photos allegedly showing a "baby bump," though no timestamps or context were attached to those images. Vanessa hasn't been publicly linked to anyone romantically, and there‚Äôs been zero confirmation from her side‚Äîuntil now.In another Instagram Story later that evening, Vanessa Bryant shared a motivational quote that hinted at how she views the entire situation and what matters to her personally.‚ÄúThe only way to impress me, is by being a good person,‚Äù the quote read. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt care what you have, what you wear, where you live, or what you drive. I just have deep respect for people with pure hearts and good intentions.‚ÄùAdding one final touch to her trilogy of clapbacks, she posted another Rihanna meme, this one stating, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not mean, I‚Äôm just not the one.‚ÄùWith the classic Rihanna memes, Vanessa showed that she is busy being a proud mom to her daughters while being the powerhouse of her business ventures. While she does not care about the rumor mill, her reaction explicitly showed that she is urging privacy.Vanessa Bryant, who shares four daughters with Kobe‚Äî Natalia, Bianka, Capri, and the late Gianna‚Äî has remained devoted to family and philanthropy. Most recently, she shared footage of a joyful family ski trip over the holidays, showing the tight-knit bond she maintains with her children.Vanessa and Kobe Bryant tied the knot in April 2001. Tragically, in January 2020, Kobe and their 13-year-old daughter Gianna lost their lives in a helicopter crash that also killed seven others. They were headed to Kobe‚Äôs Mamba Sports Academy for a youth basketball game when the accident occurred. Kobe was 41 at the time. The loss shook the sports world and left a lasting impact on fans, friends, and loved ones across the globe. Kobe has left a huge legacy to his name as well, he is considered one the of the elite NBA superstars of all time with astounding stats, records and intense playmaking abilities. His demise created a huge void in the NBA world as fans are still mourning his untimely passing.Since their passing, she‚Äôs kept their memory alive through meaningful business ventures and charitable work. Kobe launched the Mamba Sports Foundation in 2016, aiming to support young athletes. After his death, Vanessa renamed it the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation in honor of both Kobe and Gianna. Today, the foundation helps underserved boys and girls in sports, pushing forward the mission they believed in. It's her way of carrying on their legacy with purpose and heart.Vanessa Bryant‚Äôs response was indeed witty and empowering as she hinted that she deserves privacy and reminded the world that while she may be a public figure, her peace and dignity aren‚Äôt up for debate, especially not over unfounded gossip. After the viral response via memes, Vanessa has seemingly closed the chapter as she did not extend the matter any further with any other comments about it afterwards.Also Read: Is Vanessa Bryant pregnant with her 5th child? The Internet speculates about her relationship with rumoured BF Days after shutting down the pregnancy rumor, Vanessa Bryant made a glowing courtside appearance with her daughters at the New York Liberty vs. Chicago Sky game. The WNBA shared a sweet clip showing Vanessa alongside Natalia, 22, Bianka, 8, and Capri, 5, all smiling and waving for the camera.Their family moment quickly caught fans‚Äô attention online, adding a warm highlight to the evening. It was a rare and heartwarming public outing for the Bryant family, showing their strong support for women‚Äôs basketball. It was Vanessa's first public outing since she debunked the horrendous pregnancy rumor.
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant addressed her pregnancy rumors in a wild instagram story. Her response wasn‚Äôt a press statement or a legal warning, it was a wild meme. The meme featured music icon rihanna floating in water with a snorkel mask on her head and flipping her middle finger.

Article Title: NBA Trade Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers might bag $109,000,002 Miami Heat superstar to bolster squad around Luka-LeBron power duo
Article Text:
LeBron James and Alex Caruso in Los Angeles Lakers (Image via Nathaniel S. Butler/ Getty Images)

Los Angeles Lakers

Los Angeles Lakers Exploring Trade for Andrew Wiggins

Why Andrew Andrew Wiggins Makes Sense for the Los Angeles Lakers

Los Angeles Lakers vs. Charlotte Hornets: Team news, expected lineups and what to watch for in this NBA clash on February 19 (Image via Getty)

Wiggins‚Äô Career Resurgence

Key Career Highlights:

Season



Team

RPG



Notable Achievement

Warriors



17.2



4.5



NBA Champion



2024-25



Heat



16.8



4.1



Playoff contributor





How Wiggins Fits With LeBron and Doncic





Theare weighing their options this offseason, and according to a popular NBA analyst, one potential move involves swapping a key forward for a proven NBA champion.The Los Angeles Lakers have two clear paths in free agency: pursuing a dominant center or trading for an experienced wing player to bolster their championship aspirations. According to recent reports, the franchise may lean toward the latter by targeting Miami Heat star Andrew Wiggins.Lake Show Life‚Äôs Svyatoslav Rovenchuk suggests the Lakers could package forward Rui Hachimura in a deal to acquire Wiggins from the Miami Heat."The fit of Rui Hachimura alongside (Luka) Doncic and (LeBron) James has quickly come under scrutiny after a premature first-round exit to the Minnesota Timberwolves," Rovenchuk wrote. "This has led many to believe the Lakers are better off trading the starting forward." (H/t: Sporting News)Andrew Wiggins could provide the Los Angeles Lakers with much-needed perimeter scoring and defensive versatility. Here‚Äôs why this trade could work:- Salary Match: Hachimura ($17 million) plus another expiring contract could match Wiggins‚Äô $28.2 million salary for 2025-26.- Proven Playoff Performer: Wiggins was instrumental in Golden State‚Äôs 2022 title run, averaging 17.2 points and 4.5 rebounds per game.- Immediate Upgrade: While Hachimura is solid, Wiggins offers better two-way impact and championship experience.Once considered an underachieving talent in Minnesota, Wiggins revitalized his career with the Golden State Warriors . His improved motor and efficiency made him a key piece in Golden State‚Äôs success.However, after a slow start in 2024-25, the Warriors traded him to Miami in the Jimmy Butler deal.Wiggins‚Äô skill set complements the Lakers‚Äô star duo:- Reliable three-point shooting for better floor spacing.- Strong perimeter defense to ease the load on LeBron James.- Playoff-tested mentality, crucial for deep postseason runs.With the Heat struggling, Wiggins may welcome a move to a contender like the Lakers.While Hachimura has been a steady presence, Wiggins represents a clear upgrade for a Los Angeles Lakers team in win-now mode. If Los Angeles can structure the right deal, adding the former Warriors champion could be the move that pushes them back into title contention.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers have two clear paths in free agency: pursuing a dominant center or trading for an experienced wing player. According to recent reports, the franchise may lean toward the latter by targeting miami heat star andrew wiggins. The lakers could package forward rui hachimura in a deal to acquire wiggins from the miami heat.

Article Title: Travis Kelce stuns fans with Taylor Swift-inspired makeover ahead of possible last NFL season
Article Text:
Travis Kelce's new, longer hairstyle has sparked a frenzy of reactions (images via Instagram)

A bold hairstyle change that has deeper meaning for the NFL veteran

New look, new game: How Travis Kelce‚Äôs transformation reflects a career reboot





Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce has once again found himself at the center of attention‚Äîbut this time, it's not for his jaw-dropping touchdown grabs or viral podcast moments. Instead, the three-time Super Bowl champion has debuted a brand-new look that has fans and critics alike buzzing, and it may say more about his mindset than it does about his hair.Kelce appeared at his cousin Tanner Corum‚Äôs wedding in Knoxville, Tennessee, with noticeably longer hair‚Äîa sharp departure from the polished, clean-cut image he‚Äôs carried for much of his career. Accompanying him was none other than Taylor Swift , making yet another public splash for one of pop culture‚Äôs most talked-about couples.While photos of Kelce‚Äôs new hairstyle quickly went viral, social media reactions were anything but unanimous. One fan joked, ‚ÄúLooks like someone‚Äôs grandfather,‚Äù poking fun at the dramatic transformation. But others praised the look, interpreting it as a sign of growth‚Äîboth personal and professional.And that interpretation may hold weight.After a difficult 2024 season that ended in a crushing Super Bowl LIX loss to the Philadelphia Eagles, retirement whispers grew louder for the 35-year-old tight end. But instead of walking away, Kelce doubled down, signing a reported $17 million extension to stay with the Chiefs.According to those close to the team, Kelce‚Äôs energy has shifted. He‚Äôs leaned into wellness, taken up padel as a low-impact fitness tool, and slimmed down considerably. ‚ÄúHe looks like he‚Äôs dropped a few pounds and is moving better than I‚Äôve seen in a while,‚Äù a Chiefs insider shared. Even Patrick Mahomes commented that Kelce looks ‚Äúfresher‚Äù and ‚Äúleaner‚Äù heading into 2025.While Kelce‚Äôs commitment to excellence on the field is nothing new, his relationship with Taylor Swift has added an extra layer to his off-field persona. Whether it‚Äôs showing up at weddings or appearing in commercials, Kelce seems more comfortable than ever in the spotlight.Also Read: Is Travis Kelce preparing for a graceful NFL exit? 5 veterans who might retire after the 2025 season With his physical transformation, mindset reset, and strong connection with Mahomes still intact, the Chiefs veteran is clearly not done chasing greatness. He may have a new hairstyle, but the mission remains the same: bring another Lombardi Trophy home to Kansas City.And if he does? Chiefs Kingdom might just start growing their hair out in solidarity.
Article Summary: Travis kelce's new hairstyle has sparked a frenzy of reactions. The chiefs tight end appeared at his cousin tanner corum‚Äôs wedding in knoxville, tennessee, with noticeably longer hair. Photos of kelce went viral, but social media reactions were anything but unanimous.

Article Title: ‚ÄúPartying while the Oilers are losing‚Äù: Connor McDavid‚Äôs wife Lauren Kyle‚Äôs recent post with Celeste Desjardins sparks uproar during team‚Äôs losing streak
Article Text:
Lauren Kyle and Connor McDavid got married last year.(Image via Lauren Kyle/Instagram)

Connor McDavid‚Äôs wife, Lauren Kyle, gets brutally trolled by fans as she vacations with Celeste Desjardins in Greece while the Oilers lost Games 2 and 3







Connor McDavid‚Äôs wife, Lauren Kyle, and Leon Draisaitl‚Äôs fianc√©e, Celeste Desjardins , just spent possibly one of the best times of their lives in Greece as Desjardins gears up to become a bride. Both Lauren Kyle and the Canadian actress, Celeste Desjardins, have been pretty close for a long time and have gone on vacations together many times. But it seems like Lauren Kyle‚Äôs recent post about her vacation in Mykonos with Celeste Desjardins has raised eyebrows among fans.Connor McDavid‚Äôs wife, Lauren Kyle, took to her Instagram to share stunning pictures of their vacation in Mykonos. One picture has Lauren Kyle taking a dip in the sea wearing a yellow coloured bikini, while another video shows her dancing alongside Celeste Desjardins with drinks in their hands.The caption for the post reads as, ‚ÄúThe best 72 hours celebrating our girl @celestedesjardins in Mykonos!! üíôü§çüá¨üá∑ Can‚Äôt love you more!! Let‚Äôs get you married!!‚Äù, and fans are furious.A fan commented, ‚ÄúYall should be cheering your guys up‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚ÄúTell the oilers they gotta step it up‚Äù.A third fan commented, ‚Äúhow can you party when your hubby is working so hard‚Ä¶.makes no sense, it‚Äôs so odd‚Äù, while another user wrote, ‚ÄúPretty sad.Partying and Connor‚Äôs losing in the finals again. Don‚Äôt you think you should be there supporting him instead of spending his money.‚ÄùHowever, Connor McDavid‚Äôs wife, Lauren Kyle, has not responded to such comments yet, even though it is not known if she would be attending Game 4 tonight.Currently, all eyes are on the Edmonton Oilers as they gear up for Game 4 after consecutive losses in Games 2 and 3.Recently, Leon Draisaitl spoke about the loss in Game 3 and said, ‚ÄúLast night is, I mean, it's the game is over with 11 minutes left, right, like, whatever it is, and then, you know, all hell breaks loose. It's a UFC fight. But, like, I think overall, we can be a little bit more disciplined and stay away from that.‚ÄùAlso Read: "Tell him to practice": Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs daughter Paulina Gretzky‚Äôs recent post with Dustin Johnson sparks questions about his U.S. Open focus
Article Summary: Connor mcdavid's wife, lauren kyle, and leon draisaitl's fianc√©e, celeste desjardins, are vacationing in mykonos, greece. The couple have been close for a long time and have gone on vacations together many times. But it seems like lauren kyle‚Äôs recent post about her vacation has raised eyebrows among fans.

Article Title: India tour of England: Who should bat at no. 3 for Team India? Harbhajan Singh makes surprising pick
Article Text:
Harbhajan Singh (Photo by Pankaj Nangia/Getty Images)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll How do you feel about the current leadership of Shubman Gill? Excited for new leadership. Skeptical about his experience. I think it's too soon to judge.

'Cricketers Aren‚Äôt Cattle... ': Harish Thawani on the IPL and Business of Indian Cricket





NEW DELHI: Former India spinner Harbhajan Singh has backed young left-hander Sai Sudharsan to bat at No. 3 in India‚Äôs upcoming five-Test series in England, calling it a crucial opportunity for the youngster."In my opinion, Sai Sudharsan should play at No.3. He's a left-hander, in top form, and just came off a very impressive IPL. His technique is sound, and I believe he could be the solution at that position," Harbhajan said, as quoted by IANS.The Indian squad for the England tour indicates a substantial change. Following the retirement of veterans like Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli and R Ashwin from the format, an altered 18-member team will compete under 25-year-old Shubman Gill 's leadership, with Rishabh Pant serving as his deputy.Selection head Ajit Agarkar explained that Jasprit Bumrah was not considered for captaincy due to workload management concerns."Gill is a new captain, and the team is quite young ‚Äî there's no Rohit, Virat, Pujara, or even Ajinkya Rahane. It's going to be challenging, but I expect our youngsters to rise to the occasion and perform well," Harbhajan said.He requested supporters and analysts to remain understanding during the team's development: "Just because they don't win right away doesn't mean we start criticising them.The team needs support right now. They're going through a transitional phase ‚Äî a new team, a new era ‚Äî and I hope it turns out to be a successful one for Indian cricket.""The team needs to believe in themselves ‚Äî believe that they can win. This team has the ability," Harbhajan added. "These are the same youngsters ‚Äî Shubman Gill, Rishabh Pant ‚Äî who broke Australia's fortress at the Gabba. Now it's their turn to make history again. The opportunity is massive, and they should grab it with both hands."The squad selection features first-time Test call-ups for B. Sai Sudharsan and Arshdeep Singh, whilst Karun Nair and Shardul Thakur return. The exclusion of Shreyas Iyer and Mohammed Shami has generated discussion, with both fans and former captain Sourav Ganguly expressing concerns about Iyer's omission."Shreyas Iyer is a very fine player. He's proven himself in ODIs, performed in the World Cup, Champions Trophy, and IPL. So yes, he should've been in the squad. But maybe the selectors don't see him as a red-ball player right now," Harbhajan said. "If I were part of the selection committee, I would have considered him. But this is not the end ‚Äî his journey is long, and he might even be a future ODI captain. One missed tour doesn't mean his career is over. "The five-Test series begins June 20 at Headingley and marks India‚Äôs entry into the 2025‚Äì27 ICC World Test Championship cycle.
Article Summary: Former india spinner harbhajan singh backs sai sudharsan to bat at no. 3 in india‚Äôs upcoming five-test series in england. The indian squad for the england tour indicates a substantial change. The exclusion of shreyas iyer and mohammed shami has generated discussion, with both fans and former captain sourav ganguly expressing concerns.

Article Title: Mehidy Hasan Miraz appointed as new ODI captain for Bangladesh cricket team
Article Text:
Mehidy Hasan Miraz (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.





Bangladesh appointed Mehidy Hasan Miraz as their new ODI captain on Thursday, with the 27-year-old all-rounder taking over from Najmul Hossain Shanto in the limited-overs format.The Bangladesh Cricket Board confirmed that Miraz will commence his leadership during their three-match ODI series in Sri Lanka, scheduled for July."Captaining the national team is a dream come true... this is a proud moment for me and my family," he stated, as reported in the International Cricket Council (ICC) announcement."I believe in this group -- we have the skills and the mindset to play fearless cricket."Currently ranked fourth amongst ODI all-rounders in ICC rankings, Miraz brings previous leadership experience, having led Bangladesh in four ODIs whilst deputising for Shanto.The Sri Lankan tour also includes two Test matches, with the opening match beginning in Galle on June 17, followed by the second Test in Colombo from June 25.In the Test format, Miraz will serve as vice-captain under Shanto's leadership as they embark on the new World Test Championship cycle.
Article Summary: Mehidy hasan miraz appointed bangladesh's new odi captain. 27-year-old all-rounder takes over from najmul hossain shanto in limited-overs format. Miraz will commence his leadership during their three-match odi series in sri lanka.

Article Title: WTC Final: Sarfaraz Khan visits Lord‚Äôs with father Naushad, watches Australia vs South Africa
Article Text:
Sarfaraz Khan visits Lord‚Äôs with father Naushad (Screengrab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

'Nitish Kumar is a guy who can bowl that magic ball': India bowling coach Morne Morkel





NEW DELHI: Young Indian batter Sarfaraz Khan made a special visit to Lord‚Äôs on Thursday alongside his father and long-time coach, Naushad Khan , as the second day of the World Test Championship (WTC) Final between Australia and South Africa unfolded in dramatic fashion.Sarfaraz, who shared glimpses of the visit via his Instagram stories, was seen soaking in the atmosphere at the iconic venue, one where he no doubt dreams of making his mark someday.It was a father-son cricket pilgrimage of sorts, with Naushad having famously mentored Sarfaraz and his younger brother Musheer from Mumbai's maidans to international reckoning.On the field, Australia seized control of the WTC Final, largely thanks to a masterclass in fast bowling from skipper Pat Cummins Cummins delivered a sensational spell of 6-28, claiming his 300th Test wicket and dismantling South Africa for just 138.He took four wickets for just one run in a post-lunch burst that shredded the Proteas‚Äô lower order. South Africa had resumed at 43/4 and managed a brief recovery through a 64-run stand between Temba Bavuma (36) and David Bedingham (45), but collapsed shortly after. Kagiso Rabada had earlier starred with the ball for South Africa, taking 5-51, and he returned in the second innings to remove both Usman Khawaja and Cameron Green in the same over.At tea, Australia were 32-2, holding a 106-run lead with Marnus Labuschagne and Steve Smith at the crease.As Sarfaraz watched from the stands, he witnessed not just a gripping day of Test cricket but also a landmark moment in Cummins‚Äôs career, capped by a standing ovation from the Lord‚Äôs crowd, a far cry from the jeers he received during the 2023 Ashes for the Bairstow incident.
Article Summary: Sarfaraz khan visits lord's with father and long-time coach, naushad khan. Young indian batsman was seen soaking in the atmosphere at the iconic venue. Australia seized control of the wtc final thanks to a masterclass in fast bowling from pat cummins. Cummins claimed his 300th test wicket and dismantled south africa for just 138.

Article Title: Wimbledon 2025: Prize money pool hits record high; All you need to know
Article Text: Wimbledon has announced a record prize money pool ahead of the 2025 edition, set to commence later this month. With a 7% increase from last year and double the amount from a decade ago for the winner, the new prize pool is a massive jump. First-round singles losers will also see a 10% rise in prize money.
Article Summary: Wimbledon has announced a record prize money pool ahead of the 2025 edition. With a 7% increase from last year and double the amount from a decade ago for the winner. First-round singles losers will also see a 10% rise in prize money.

Article Title: "We're being smart": Kenneth Walker III injury scare hits Seattle Seahawks just weeks before 2025 season prep begins
Article Text:
Kenneth Walker III injury scare hits Seattle Seahawks just weeks before 2025 season prep begins (Image via Getty)

Kenneth Walker III Injured during Seattle Seahawks mini-camp

Mike Macdonald and Geno Smith react to Kenneth Walker III‚Äôs injury

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not too serious, but we‚Äôre being smart.‚Äù

Also Read:





The Seattle Seahawks are getting ready for the 2025 NFL season. Fans are anxious to witness their team's performance. One of the players this year will be running back Kenneth Walker III. He had a stellar season last year, and the Seattle Seahawks were hoping he would push the offence forward this year. But during a recent practice, something unexpected happened. The team stayed quiet for a while. Now, there is a fresh update. It‚Äôs not what fans were hoping to hear. The update has raised concerns about Kenneth Walker III‚Äôs health and his chances of starting the season strong.Kenneth Walker III suffered an injury on Tuesday, June 11, 2025. It was the second day of the Seattle Seahawks' mandatory mini-camp and the team was practicing at its facility in Renton, Washington. Kenneth Walker III was taking part in normal team drills. Midway through the practice, he slowed down and looked uncomfortable. Trainers walked over and helped him off the field. He did not return for the rest of the day.Later, head coach Mike Macdonald spoke to reporters. He said, ‚ÄúKenneth felt something in his groin.We decided not to take any chances.‚Äù Kenneth Walker III is now being looked at by the medical team. Mike Macdonald added, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre being cautious. We‚Äôll see how he feels over the next few days.‚ÄùKenneth Walker III was not limping badly when he left the field. But the team does not want to make things worse. His groin issue could take some time to heal. That‚Äôs why he is not expected to practice for the rest of the week.Kenneth Walker III had a strong season last year. He rushed for 1,050 yards and scored 9 touchdowns. The Seattle Seahawks are counting on him again this season. His health is very important to their plans.After the practice, quarterback Geno Smith spoke to the press. He said, ‚ÄúKenneth is a tough guy. We all want him back soon, but health comes first.‚Äù Coach Mike Macdonald shared a similar view. He said,Kenneth Walker III has not talked to the media yet. But he was seen walking without major pain. That gave some hope to fans watching nearby.The Seattle Seahawks have two more minicamp days this week. Kenneth Walker III is likely to rest and recover. The team hopes he will be fully ready by training camp in late July.
Article Summary: Kenneth walker iii suffered an injury on tuesday, june 11, 2025. It was the second day of the seattle seahawks' mandatory mini-camp. Kenneth walker iii was taking part in normal team drills. Midway through the practice, he slowed down and looked uncomfortable. Trainers walked over and helped him off the field.

Article Title: Angkrish Raghuvanshi, Suryansh Shedge, and Musheer Khan to tour UK with Mumbai Emerging team
Article Text:
Angkrish Raghuvanshi (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.





MUMBAI: Talented youngsters Angkrish Raghuvanshi, Suryansh Shedge and Musheer Khan are all part of an 18-member Mumbai Emerging (Under-23) squad which will travel to England later this month (on June 28) for an exposure tour.Earlier in February this year, the Mumbai Cricket Association (MCA) announced that it will be sending its "Emerging Team" to the UK for a tour this summer.This initiative aims to provide valuable exposure to promising young players.Raghuvanshi was impressive for Kolkata Knight Riders in IPL 2025, while Shedge and Musheer played for Punjab Kings.The team will play 10 matches (five two-day matches and five one-day matches) against local teams in England. The captain of the team will be decided on June 14, while the team's head coach will be the current Mumbai senior selector Kiran Powar.MCA joint secretary Deepak Patil and treasurer Arman Malik are the coordinators of the team, while Khodadad Yazdegardi, the Vice President and Cricket Secretary of the Parsee Gymkhana, is the facilitator.
Article Summary: Angkrish raghuvanshi, suryansh shedge and musheer khan are all part of an 18-member mumbai emerging (under-23) squad. The team will travel to england later this month (on june 28) for an exposure tour. The captain of the team will be decided on june 14, while the head coach will be the current mumbai senior selector kiran powar.

Article Title: ‚ÄúShe played her cards right‚Äù: Travis Hunter buys a luxurious house worth over $3 million with wife Leanna Lenee but it has sparked concern among fans
Article Text:
Travis Hunter recently tied the knot with Leanna Lenee.(Image via Leanna Lenee/Instagram)

Travis Hunter and Leanna Lenee bought a luxurious home worth over $3 million but fans feel Lenee has ‚Äúwrong intentions‚Äù



Travis Hunter and his wife, Leanna Lenee, have received support from Cam Newton







Travis Hunter, the recent Heisman Trophy winner, has been enjoying his life with his newly married wife, Leanna Lenee. While Travis Hunter is gearing up for the upcoming season of the NFL and has been spotted at the Jacksonville Jaguars‚Äô OTAs, he has been making huge investments along with his wife, Leanna Lenee. But many feel that Leanna Lenee has ‚Äúother intentions‚Äù.Recently, Travis Hunter, the Jacksonville Jaguars‚Äô rookie, bought a $3.275 million luxurious home in the gated community of Jacksonville‚Äôs Deerwood County Country Club.The luxurious home is of a whopping 7.5 acres and has around 13 rooms - 5 bedrooms, a pool, 7 bathrooms, a garage for 4 cars and a huge tennis court.While Travis Hunter and his wife, Leanna Lenee, have not reacted to the news of their newly purchased property yet, fans are concerned about the Heisman Trophy winner.A fan took to X and wrote, ‚ÄúShe played her cards right‚Äù, while another fan commented, ‚ÄúShe has never once looked at him in the eyes as a woman in love, she only looks at his wallet and is even repulsed when he's kissing her cheek, if y'all can't see how bad this is, I'm glad y'all won't get married‚Äù.A third fan wrote, ‚ÄúTravis you gonna learn the hardway‚Äù, while another fan posted, ‚ÄúAll she gotta do is have 2/3 kids and she pretty much set for life.She‚Äôll be able to get a new man and be paid for the rest of her life. I‚Äôm happy for her. Travis you should‚Äôve read the signs‚Äù.A fifth fan joked, ‚ÄúDid she give him a key?‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚ÄúShe‚Äôs about to take everything he got lmao let‚Äôs check back in 4 years‚Ä¶‚ÄùTravis Hunter and Leanna Lenee have remained silent around all the negative attention that their beautiful wedding has received over the last few weeks.Amid this, former NFL star, Cam Newton has supported Travis Hunter and Leanna Lenee.On a recent episode of Cam Newton‚Äôs popular podcast, 4th&1 With Cam Newton, the former NFL star said, ‚ÄúCongratulations to the Hunters. You know his wife, LL Cool J. She cool. She has been a punching bag, and it‚Äôs unfortunate.‚ÄùAlso Read: ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre gonna make love all night‚Äù: Travis Hunter and Leanna Lenee‚Äôs private wedding moment goes viral amid ongoing hate
Article Summary: Travis hunter and leanna lenee bought a luxurious home worth over $3 million. But fans feel that lenee has ‚Äúwrong intentions‚Äô former nfl star, cam newton has supported travis hunter and his wife. The heisman trophy winner is gearing up for the nfl season.

Article Title: ‚ÄúKids love Steph Curry‚Äù ‚Äî Magic Johnson explains why Stephen Curry‚Äôs influence goes way beyond the court
Article Text:
(Image Source - Getty Images)

Stephen Curry‚Äôs Influence Extends Beyond Basketball as He Builds a Fanbase the NBA Never Had

Magic Johnson joins Get Up! üëè His message to Luka Doncic üó£Ô∏è 'IN LA, WE EXPECT CHAMPIONSHIPS!' üèÜ





Drawing in a massive following of young fans and rewriting the rules of basketball, Stephen Curry is not just altering the Golden State Warriors ‚Äî he‚Äôs changing the definition of an NBA superstar. Magic Johnson, the Lakers icon, pointed out on ESPN‚Äôs Get Up that Curry‚Äôs reach is much greater than his remarkable four NBA championships, two MVPs, and exceptional shooting ability. Discover how this superstar has connected generations, influenced the culture, and claimed his position at the top of the game.Magic Johnson didn‚Äôt hold back ‚Äî ‚Äúkids love Steph Curry‚Ä¶ they love how he shoots the basketball, but also how he carries himself.‚Äù That feeling really sums up what makes Curry so special‚Äîhis influence goes way past the usual basketball stats. For sure, Curry broke records‚Äîmore than 3,390 career three-pointers, the highest in NBA history‚Äîand he was the first player to be a unanimous MVP in 2016, helping the Warriors achieve a 73-win season.The magic of Curry lies in his ability to pull in a new generation of fans‚Äîkids who admire his long-range shooting and his chill demeanor.This isn‚Äôt just luck ‚Äî Curry is among the NBA‚Äôs leading jersey sellers, and his family-oriented image featuring adorable snapshots of his daughter Riley and wife Ayesha‚Äîis crucial to his widespread brand influence.Curry's on-court achievements really solidify his impact: he's got four championships (2015, 2017, 2018, 2022), one Finals MVP, and two league MVPs, with one being the only unanimous choice ever. His success has propelled the Warriors to worldwide fame and sparked a change in basketball strategy‚Äînow, hitting deep threes is a must.According to Magic Johnson, Curry‚Äôs greatness isn‚Äôt just in scoring‚Äîit‚Äôs in making his teammates better: ‚Äúthere‚Äôs very few guys‚Ä¶ who‚Äôs ever made their teammates better.‚Äù Curry's selfless style of play, shown through his knack for assisting, leadership qualities, and mentor-like vibe, has built strong trust and unity in Golden State.Also Read: Tyrese Haliburton scores 22 points in NBA Finals Game 3 and then roasts his dad John Haliburton Beyond basketball, Curry's impact keeps growing through charity work and cultural projects. With programs like Eat. Learn. Play, and encourage young activists‚Äîsuch as advocating for literacy and inspiring dreams of political or civic involvement‚Äîhe's teaching a generation that having influence comes with responsibility.
Article Summary: Stephen curry is changing the definition of an nba superstar. Magic johnson, the lakers icon, pointed out that curry‚Äôs reach is much greater than his remarkable four nba championships, two mvps, and exceptional shooting ability. The magic of curry lies in his ability to pull in a new generation of fans‚Äîkids who admire his long-range shooting and his chill demeanor.

Article Title: Peja Stojakovic Accuses Rich Paul of Blackmail in De‚ÄôAaron Fox Trade From Sacramento Kings to San Antonio Spurs
Article Text:
(Image Source- Getty Images)

Peja Stojakovic claims Rich Paul controlled De‚ÄôAaron Fox trade destination to the San Antonio Spurs





What began as an exciting three-team trade has now turned into a scandal. Peja Stojakovic, the former Sacramento Kings star and executive, has made a shocking claim ‚Äî he says that agent Rich Paul essentially "blackmailed" the Kings into trading De‚ÄôAaron Fox to the San Antonio Spurs, not for the best deal, but to push Klutch Sports‚Äô interests.On the NBA Out of Bounds and NBA Mozzart podcasts, Peja Stojakovic mentioned that Rich Paul gave a "directive" about where De‚ÄôAaron Fox should go, essentially "blackmailing the Kings" into sealing the deal with the San Antonio Spurs. Consequently, Sacramento Kings was said to have missed out on the chance to consider offers from other teams, which Peja Stojakovic thinks restricted their negotiation options.At the center of the deal was a three-team swap in February 2025 that sent De‚ÄôAaron Fox and Jordan McLaughlin to the San Antonio Spurs, while Zach LaVine, another Rich Paul client, landed in Sacramento King from the Chicago Bulls, along with multiple future draft selections. The Kings received three first-round picks (for 2025, 2027 and 2031) plus three seconds, and flipped prospect Sidy Cissoko for center Jonas Valanciunas.Statistically, De‚ÄôAaron Fox had impressive stats in his 17 games with the San Antonio Spurs, averaging 19.7 points, 6.8 assists, and 4.3 rebounds before a finger injury at the end of the season put him out of action.On the other hand, Zach LaVine joined Sacramento‚Äôs backcourt, but the team ended up with a 40‚Äì42 record and didn‚Äôt make the playoffs.Peja Stojakovic believes that if the Kings had explored more options for trading De‚ÄôAaron Fox, they could have gotten a better return than just draft picks and one standout player.This isn't the first time Rich Paul has faced accusations of manipulating things behind the scenes: critics were quick to blame him during the Anthony Davis trade to the Lakers back in 2019.Now, the growing claims from a well-respected former executive highlight how influential agents, particularly those representing several high-profile clients, can sway trade dynamics and impact franchise decisions.Peja Stojakovic's statements make us rethink if NBA trades are just a front-office thing or if agents like Rich Paul actually have a say in the matter. If teams are limited by what their clients want, especially with the risk of losing star players, it seems like the power dynamics in trade discussions could be changing. For Kings fans, the lingering question is: was De'Aaron Fox really worth the price they paid?
Article Summary: Peja stojakovic claims rich paul controlled de‚Äôaaron fox trade destination to the san antonio spurs. The former sacramento kings star and executive said paul essentially "blackmailed" the kings into trading de'aaron fox to the spurs, not for the best deal, but for klutch sports' interests.

Article Title: WTC Final: Pat Cummins claims fifer against South Africa, surpasses Indian great on elite list
Article Text:
Australia's captain Pat Cummins (AP Photo/Kirsty Wigglesworth)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Pat Cummins on WTC Final: 'Cameron Green deserves a spot in the lineup'

Most Test 5-fers as captain

12 - Imran Khan

9 - Richie Benaud

9 - Pat Cummins

8 - Bishan Singh Bedi

7 - Courtney Walsh

7 - Jason Holder

Poll Should Pat Cummins be considered among the greatest Test captains of all time? Yes, absolutely! Not yet, needs more time No, there are better captains

'Cricketers Aren‚Äôt Cattle... ': Harish Thawani on the IPL and Business of Indian Cricket





NEW DELHI: Australia skipper Pat Cummins delivered a breathtaking bowling performance at Lord‚Äôs, grabbing 6 for 28 to rip through South Africa‚Äôs batting order and tilt the World Test Championship final heavily in his side‚Äôs favour.Cummins‚Äôs masterclass saw him register his 14th five-wicket haul in Tests and reach a major personal milestone, surpassing Indian great Bishan Singh Bedi and matching Richie Benaud with nine five-fors as a Test captain, the second-most in history behind Pakistan's Imran Khan (12).The South African innings collapsed spectacularly on Day 2, skittled out for just 138 in reply to Australia‚Äôs modest 212.Cummins, who had already taken two wickets in the morning session, returned after lunch to produce a blistering burst, four wickets for one run in just 17 balls, leaving South Africa reeling.Temba Bavuma and David Bedingham had briefly steadied the ship with a 64-run partnership for the fifth wicket. Bavuma, who started the day on 3 not out, showed some fight with a stylish six off Cummins and a lofted drive off Starc, but was dismissed soon after, caught at cover by a diving Marnus Labuschagne.Cummins struck again quickly after lunch, removing Kyle Verreynne lbw and trapping Marco Jansen for a duck in the same over. He then ended Bedingham‚Äôs 111-ball effort by inducing an edge to the keeper before the lower order completely disintegrated.A farcical run-out of Keshav Maharaj only added to South Africa‚Äôs woes, and Cummins fittingly wrapped up the innings with his 300th Test wicket, dismissing Kagiso Rabada , caught at deep square leg by Beau Webster.With this performance, Cummins not only reaffirmed his status as one of the premier fast bowlers of his generation but also etched his name alongside the game‚Äôs greats as a captain who leads by fiery example.
Article Summary: Australia captain pat cummins takes 6 for 28 on day 2 of world test championship final. South africa skittled out for just 138 in reply to australia‚Äôs modest 212. Cummins surpasses bishan singh bedi and matches richie benaud with nine five-fors as a test captain.

Article Title: Watch: 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi breathes fire with bat; video goes viral
Article Text:
Vaibhav Suryavanshi (Screengrabs)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you think Vaibhav Suryavanshi will become a future star in international cricket? Yes, absolutely! Maybe, if he keeps performing. No, it's too early to tell.

'Nitish Kumar is a guy who can bowl that magic ball': India bowling coach Morne Morkel





NEW DELHI: India‚Äôs cricketing future appears to be in safe and sensational hands. Vaibhav Suryavanshi, a 14-year-old prodigy from Bihar and Rajasthan Royals ‚Äô latest find, has once again captured national attention after smashing a jaw-dropping 190 off just 90 balls in a practice match at the BCCI‚Äôs Centre of Excellence in Bengaluru.The video of his explosive knock, recorded during an India Under-19 team camp, has since gone viral, sending social media into a frenzy.Watch:This latest innings adds to the rapidly growing legend of Suryavanshi, who has already rewritten the record books in his debut IPL season.This year, the teenager became the youngest-ever centurion in men's T20 cricket when he hammered 101 off 38 balls against Gujarat Titans, a blistering knock that included the second-fastest century in IPL history, off just 35 deliveries.Suryavanshi made his IPL debut against Lucknow Super Giants under unexpected circumstances, stepping in for the injured Sanju Samson.He made an immediate impact, smashing his very first ball, bowled by Shardul Thakur, for six, and finishing with a quickfire 34 off 20 balls. By the end of the season, he had tallied 252 runs in seven matches, cementing his place as one of the most promising young talents in Indian cricket.His IPL journey began in unprecedented fashion when, at just 13 years old, he was picked up by Rajasthan Royals for Rs 1.1 crore during the 2025 auction, making him the youngest player ever to sign an IPL contract.But Suryavanshi's brilliance isn‚Äôt limited to T20s. He notched a 58-ball century in a four-day match against Australia U-19, played a key role in India‚Äôs run to the final of the 2024 ACC U-19 Asia Cup, and famously scored an unbeaten 332 in the Randhir Verma Tournament, a remarkable triple-century in junior cricket.
Article Summary: Vaibhav suryavanshi scores 190 off just 90 balls in practice match. The 14-year-old prodigy has already rewritten the record books in his debut ipl season. He became the youngest-ever centurion in men's t20 cricket.
